General.Name: Sunstone Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunstone Development Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of prebaked carbon anodes for the aluminum industry in China and internationally. It is also involved in the import of petroleum coke, as well as export of prebaked anodes. In addition, the company offers low-carbon services. Sunstone Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Linyi, China.
General.Address: North side of New 104 National Road, Linyi, China, 251500

AddressData.Street: North side of New 104 National Road
